title: [you] Ruined It for Everyone!: 101 People Who Screwed Things Up
description:
Energy sources are massively depleted. The government is wasteful and incompetent. The economy is imploding, the environment is toxic, and international terrorism threatens our day-to-day lives. And gum sucks. It just sucks. Who is responsible? Who made our world so dangerous, so unlivable, so stupid?

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a book to keep in your bathroom for perusal before you end up having to drink out of your toilet bowl because thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no potable water left in your hemisphere. HereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a book thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll tell you who ruined it for everyone.
